runs.comm: fuller length, but down the leg side. It gets a bit of shape in to the right hander, hits the pads and the batsmen take a leg-bye
this one is right up, again comes in in the air, honing on the off stump, Faf digs it out towards the off side
pulls the length back now, this one is on the off stump line and Faf comes forward and defends it towards cover

big shout for lbw! Faf survives. It was the classical left-armer's delivery. Fuller length, comes in with the angle and hits the pads as Faf looks for a flick. Hitting the leg stump. Faf very lucky there.
length ball on the middle, driven towards wide mid-on for a single
the batsman goes back and across to this ball outside off, but gets an under-edge towards the keeper as the ball comes in to him
tossed up delivery, comes in with the angle, defended from the crease
this one is slightly down the leg side, the batsman is not able to get it away
again slants into the pads and the batsman defends it towards the leg side
a quicker delivery on the middle, the batsman stays on the crease and pushes it towards cover

yorks himself! Faf's disappointed for missing out as he was the batsman in form. It was a flighted delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman took a couple of steps down the pitch, but the ball drifts in and the batsman yorks himself. It hits the pads and then disturbs the stumps.
flighted delivery outside off, de Kock tries to drive it to the off side, gets an inside edge that rolls towards the leg side
finds gap on the off side with a beautifully timed steer through point. It just beats the two men in the infield there and runs to the boundary. Top shot
length ball on the off, the batsman comes forward and defends towards cover
the batsman walks across, but the ball is slightly short of length and shapes in. The batsman misses it as he has walked too far across and misses and the ball goes over the leg stump
he bowls it wide outside off, this time it's a wide
short and wide, but the batsman misses out as the ball stays low and goes under the bat
back of length on off, Davids comes forward and defends it to the off side
fuller length on off stump, driven to extra cover for a single
pushed through on the off and middle, the batsman gets a leading edge towards off as he attempts to turn it to leg side
tossed up, the batsman comes down the pitch and smashes it hard past a diving mid-off
and now he goes aerial, sends this one soaring towards the sight screen
flatter delivery, pushed to mid-on who had gone a little deep after the previous two shots
short and wide outside off, the batsman punches it hard towards cover where Guptill makes a diving save and prevents a certain boundary
flatter delivery on off, punched towards cover off the back foot
back of length on off stump line, the batsman stays on the crease and pushes it towards midwicket
lovely timing and placement from Davids again. It was back of length, going away with the angle and Davids stays back and opens the face to beat the fielder at point
fuller length outside off, driven to cover point where Hira's fumble allows a single

caught by mid off fielder at long on! Wow. de Kock went for the big shot down the ground to this fuller delivery on the off stump line, but got under it too much. That went miles in the air and Corey Anderson runs in from mid-off to slide in take that comfortably around the long-on area. Zooper catch!
short of length on off stump, the batsman tries to work it on the on side, gets an inside edge on to his pads
short-ish delivery on the leg side and the batsman loves this gift, pulls it hard and easy to the deep backward square leg boundary
flighted delivery outside off, driven off the front foot to cover
short and slow, the batsman goes back and pushes the ball to wide mid-on as the ball stays a bit low
flatter delivery outside off, Ontong comes forward, and gets an inside edge towards square leg
it is turned towards deep midwicket with soft hands and the batsmen are quick to take a couple
flighted on the middle and leg line, pushed to wide mid-on for a single
flatter delivery on the pads, turned towards midwicket for another easy single
short of length outside off, and at Franklin's pace, David's loves it. He pulls it over midwicket towards the boundary
fuller length wide outside off, the batsman stretches out and drives it to deep cover for an easy single
slower delivery on the off stump line, the batsman waits for the ball and defends it down the pitch
length ball on the middle and leg, easily flicked away to deep backward square
slower length ball outside off, hit straight to cover from the crease
short of length, the batsman waits and pushes it towards the right of extra cover for a quick single
length ball outside off, driven to cover off the front foot
charges down the pitch and wanted to hit it over the off side, gets a thick outside edge to third-man
Ontong targets the area and hits it well. He stays in the crease to this length ball and times it over extra cover for a one-bounce four
the bowler pulls his length back. Ontong pulls this one down to fine leg
short of length on the middle stump line, the lack of pace means that the batsman gets hit on the pads and the ball runs towards third-man area

short and wide, Davids could have left that alone but he plays a nothing shot towards cover. It goes straight to Guptill, a bit high, but he is unable to hold on to that but drops it. Tries in vain a couple of times.
length ball on off and middle, turned to deep square leg for a single
fuller ball down the leg side, the batsman manages to push it to deep midwicket
short of length on off, the batsman pulls towards deep midwicket without any timing
full on the pads again and it is easily turned to deep backward square leg
short of length delivery and the batsman pulls, lucky that the ball just falls short of the deep midwicket fielder
length ball on off, the batsman tries to flay it without any feet movement, gets an outside edge past the keeper
flighted and full, the batsman comes down the pitch and drives it to long-off
this one stays a little low and the batsman gets beaten outside off
pushed towards deep midwicket with soft hands
full and flighted, the batsman punches it towards the right of the bowler, who dives but can't stop the ball cleanly
flat and full again, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep midwicket
full and outside off, the batsman stays on the crease and opens the face to run it to short third-man
slower delivery, full outside off, the batsman has to wait and wait, and then drive it hard towards deep cover
another slower ball, but the batsman is already down on his knee to play that scoop down the leg side, gets hit on the pads, but survives the appeal
fuller length outside off, this time Davids finds the gap at deep point as he slashes this one hard
short of length on off, the batsman waits and opens the face to run it towards point
short of length on off, Ontong stays back and wrists it towards the leg side for another single
fuller delivery on off, driven to long-off
flatter delivery on the stumps, pushed to long-on for a single
takes a couple of steps and takes the flighted delivery on the full, drives it to long-off
he jumps out to this flat delivery, but hits it towards long-on, luckily he didn't get any timing in that shot
Ontong shows how it's timed, this one goes straight to the sight screen
scoops the ball towards long-off and it falls short again.
express running by the two. This one is played not very far to the right of deep midwicket but they hare back for a couple and complete it comfortably
length ball on the off, pushed towards long-on for a single. Davids call for a second is rightly turned down
full and on the pads, Ontong misses his hoick completely, gets hit on the pads and the ball rolls towards the short fine leg area
he gets to his second consecutive fifty! short ball on the body, Davids tries to pull but only gets it as far as short fine leg

slower delivery on the off stump, the batsman blocks and just takes off for a run. The bowler runs and boots that ball towards the stumps and had it hit, the batsman was miles out. Infact he could have picked it up and tried
short and slow, the batsman swivels and finds the gap at deep backward square
fuller length outside off, the ball is driven to extra cover, who has a shy at the stumps but misses. Another tight single.
flatter delivery on off, the batsman places it nicely at the gap at deep midwicket and the two are super quick, complete the two easily
a full-toss, is pushed awkwardly towards midwicket
length ball, smashed to deep midwicket for a single
full and flat on the pads, turned towards deep backward square leg for a single
Oh wow! the batsman makes room and slams it right back to the bowler, who makes a stop and has a shy at the non-striker's in one motion. Davids would have been short
premeditated sweep to this full delivery on the middle, can't beat the short fine leg
he gets under this slower delivery on off, it was on a length and that helped him get under it and slam it to deep midwicket boundary
bludgeons this length ball to the gap between deep square leg and deep midwicket, hits the boundary on the full
slower and fuller outside off, Ontong drives it hard straight down the ground where long-off makes a sliding stop
slower delivery on a length and Ontong gets a top edge that falls well short of long-off
and he runs out of luck this time. Another slower ball outside off, the batsman tries to send it out of the ground but only gets it as far as extra cover.
another slower ball, down the leg side, Davids waits and pushes it towards deep square leg
short and it sits up nicely, Davids times it to deep midwicket boundary easily
wide outside off
fuller length on off, the batsman doesn't get any timing as he tries to push it to the leg side, it rolls towards short fine leg
slower ball, but down the leg side and Miller gets some inside edge that takes the ball past the short fine leg
length ball outside off, driven to deep cover off the front foot

wow! Another superb effort by the fielder which will go down as a drop. The ball was full outside off, and Davids finds the sweetest spot on his bat to time towards extra cover, the fielder dives and gets one hand to it that certainly prevents a boundary
fuller on the off, blocked towards extra cover for a single
full and wide down the leg side, who doesn't love an extra
short ball, only gets up as high as the waist, the batsman pulls it to the left of deep midwicket for a couple
yorker outside off, it's blocked down the pitch and the batsmen scoot for a single
caught at deep midwicket! Davids finally finds a fielder. It was a length ball on off and the batsman half-flicks it towards deep midwicket, the timing on that taking it as far as the fielder in deep
fuller length on off, driven down the ground to long-on
full, yorker length on the middle, the batsman makes room to drive it towards off, but gets an inside edge and the ball stays near the crease. The batsmen quickly take a single
pushed through on the middle, the batsman goes back and turns it to deep midwicket
fuller length outside off, driven towards deep extra cover for a couple
tossed up full on off, the batsman goes down on his knee and picks it over midwicket for a one-bounce four
bowls it full and flat on off, the batsman drives it towards long on
the batsman charges down, but the bowler sees that and pulls the length back and bowls it a touch wide too. Miller can only push it to long off
full and flat on the middle, driven back to the bowler
full length on the pads, the batsman drives it towards deep midwicket
tries to bowl a yorker but loses direction as this one goes wide outside off
another one wide outside off, he was attempting a slower ball this time
length ball outside off and it's in the batsman's arc, he finds the gap between deep midwicket and long-on to a perfection
another length delivery and this time he gets everything behind that shot, it clears the boundary easily over deep midwicket
wide outside off, would have been called had the batsman not gone for it, he hit it towards wide long-off and ran like on a jet-pack
misses a full-toss outside off
Neesham bowls the third wide of the over outside off
full toss on off, the batsman tries to whack it to the leg side, but gets a top-edge that falls safely in the gap at extra cover, with the fielder waiting in the deep.
full and wide outside off, Miller finds the gap at deep point with a lofted drive
fuller ball outside off and Miller drives it hard to extra cover this time. Miller is getting what he wants, he is good on the off side
slower ball on a length, the batsman drags it towards wide long-on and sprints across for a couple. Anderson sends in a rocket from the deep but the batsman's dives saves him
slower ball, full and on off, Miller drives it straight down the ground

caught at deep square leg! That is catch No. 4 for Corey James Anderson. It was a short ball going outside off with the angle, but Miller tries to pull it to deep midwicket boundary, gets a top-edge and Anderson settles under is nicely.

caught at fine leg! short ball on the body, the batsman swivels to play a hook shot that goes straight to the fielder at fine leg, it's not Anderson, it's Mitchell M. Bracewell will be on a hat-trick next time (next year)
